What I do

The Process

I have worked with many people from different fields and this has given me experience seeing things from a business perspective. Whether it's MBA's, small business owners, or entrepreneurs I listen to what you have to say and we'll work together to create a solution.

G Suite Development

From scripts to do repetitive tasks to custom tools to keep your business organized, I can help. I also have experience publishing Google Sheet's Add-on to the Marketplace.

Web Applications

Applications that run on the web for in-house or customer facing tools. Preferably you have a design created for customer facing applications.

Website Development

Simple business websites and landing pages. I can also help set up Google Analytics and tracking pixels, and set up listings on Google My Business, Bing Places for Business, etc.

Tech I Use

Scripts: Google Apps Script, Python

Web apps: React, Angular, Django, Python, Javascript, C#/ .NET Core, MySQL, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform

Contact Me

If you have any questions or looking for help

with a project let me know and we can schedule a chat!

Around the Web

Credits

Theme created by Jerome Lachaud

Copyright © Howard Luong 2020

Google Sheets Sidebar

Google Sheets sidebar which helped automate their estimate spreadsheet by pulling in all their data into one easy to use tool. Code in the background calculates prices, arranges items on the spreadsheet according to the day, searches for vacant accommodations.

  • Client: Connected Montreal
  • Date: October 2020
  • Service: Web Development

Filtpod

Consumer app for a client that allows paying members to log in and perform a specified activity. Data is stored in MySQL. Hosted by Firebase and PythonAnywhere. React Frontend and Django/ Django Rest Framework server. Cron tasks peformed by Google Cloud Scheduler

  • Client: TBD
  • Date: Sept 2020
  • Service: Web Development

Google Apps Script Estimator Web App

Google Apps Script web app for employees to create estimates using an existing spreadsheet. Created to address the issues of employees creating copies of the spreadsheet and employees breaking the spreadsheet.

Created with React, Google Apps Script, Google Sheets

  • Client: Ardmor Inc.
  • Date: February 2020
  • Service: Web Development

Tap Tag Tag

Web app to tag images with words either manually or using OCR. Files can be from your phone camera or an image upload. Ability to search past pictures saved to one's account.

Created with Angular 6, MySQL, Amazon S3, Django, Google Vision API

  • Client: Personal Project
  • Date: January 2020
  • Service: Web Development

Ordering Widget

Widget embedded into a business' website to help customers plan and order party trays.

Created with Angular 6, Firebase, Firebase Real Time Database, Invoices sent via Send Grid email API, Angular Material for styling

  • Client: Hanford Rice Bowl
  • Date: January 2019
  • Service: Web Development

Sales Data Parser

Python script with pandas and matplotlib to clean data exported as plain text. Plain text documents were irregularly formatted and the script had to take into account the irregularities. Data was displayed on Google Data Studio and used to make business decisions.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: July 2018
  • Service: Hanford Rice Bowl
